fields.name: Fossil Neutra Chronograph 44mm Men's Watch
fields.description: The Neutra Chronograph watch by Fossil is a more unique timepiece - featuring a classic design made with a more modern ideology. Here it is presented with a decadently deep blue face that features a bold black date window, three chronograph sub-dials and classic gold-tone hands and hour markers. Crafted in an impressive 44mm sizing, it also features a metallic silver-tone steel bezel and casing that houses a quartz movement. The brown leather strap finishes the terrific timepiece in style and features slightly darker edges for a final stamp of visual finesse.

fields.name: Fossil Townsmen 48MM Automatic Skeleton Dial Case Brown Strap Watch
fields.description: This 48 mm Townsman features a grey satin dial, automatic movement and an amber leather strap.

fields.name: Fossil Machine 42mm Green Dial Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Fossil presents this 42mm gents Machine collection model featuring a green dial with day and date function. Fitted with a stainless steel bracelet, the timepiece offers water resistancy of 50 meters and is powered by quartz movement.

fields.name: Fossil Machine 42mm Blue Dial Tan Strap Watch
fields.description: Mastering the balance of vintage inspiration with modern design, this timepiece encapsulates the minimalistic aesthetic, which sits effortlessly against the wrist. Presented on a 42mm case with a silver bezel and a blue dial that features a day and date window and silver batons. This elegant simplicity is further accentuated with a tan leather strap. It is water resistant up to 100 meters.

fields.name: Fossil Everett 42mm Blue Dial Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: This 42mm Fossil Everett features a blue sunray and textured dial, three-hand date movement and a silver-tone stainless steel bracelet. Powered by quartz movement and offering water resistancy of 50m, this watch is suitable for all occasions. Order today!

fields.name: Fossil Neutra Black Dial Brown Leather 44mm Men's Watch
fields.description: By pairing an on-trend grey face with a classic brown leather strap, this Fossil watch offers the dapper gentleman the best of both worlds. It is made in a regal 44mm sizing (for a standout presence on the wrist) and is powered by a reliable quartz movement. The round chronograph face houses three sub-dials and makes use of eye-catching white detailing at the hands, hour and minute markers and neat date feature. Sure to become a staple piece of wristwear to be enjoyed time and time again.

fields.name: Fossil FB-03 46mm Black Dial Chronograph Yellow Gold PVD Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Fossil's dedication to producing statement making pieces inspired by American vintage wear is represented in this model. The stainless steel link bracelet and case have been PVD finished into a golden hue while the dial and bezel contrast it in black. The piece is equipped with a chronograph and features 100M water resistance.

fields.name: Fossil Machine 42mm Black Chronograph Dial Black PVD & Steel Case Brown Leather Strap Watch
fields.description: Make a statement with this dramatic timepiece featuring a brushed stainless steel black IP case and a brown leather strap. This Fossil Machine Mid-Size watch also features a chronograph movement. Powered by quartz movement and offering water resistancy of 50m, this watch is suitable for all occasions.

fields.name: Fossil Riley Rose Chronograph Dial Cubic Zirconia Bezel Rose Gold Plated Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Fossil presents this Riley ladies model featuring a rose gold chronograph dial with cubic zirconia set bezel. Fitted with a rose gold plated stainless steel bracelet, the timepiece offers water resistancy of 100M/10BAR and is powered by quartz movement. Perfect as a gift for oneself or to a loved one, order today!

fields.name: Fossil Carlie Stainless-Steel Ladies Watch
fields.description: With a feminine style, this Fossil Carlie combines rich materials and elegant design. This impeccable timepiece is fashioned with floating T-bar lugs, a crystal bezel and sunray finish dial. Quartz movement and water resistancy deliver the quality of the piece.

fields.name: Fossil Virginia Rose Gold Dial Bracelet Ladies Watch
fields.description: Shiny steel meets dramatic glitz - made for modern sophisticates and vintage enthusiasts alike, our ever-chic Virginia is a stylish wrist essential.

fields.name: Fossil Carlie Mini 28mm Yellow Gold Steel Case Watch
fields.description: Designed with a certain charm, Carlie is the watch that will pull your look together effortlessly. The white round face is further embellished with white and yellow gold batons and Arabic numerals on 12, 3, 6, and 9 o'clock positions. This elegant ladies' watch is a classic piece that will be treasured for years.

fields.name: Fossil Charlie 35mm Green Dial Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Fossil presents the 35mm Carlie model, featuring a green dial and fitted with a stainless steel bracelet. Powered by quartz movement, the timepiece offers water resistancy of 50 meters.

fields.name: Fossil Jacqueline Ladies' Pink Mother of Pearl Pink Strap Watch
fields.description: FOSSIL JACQUELINE PINK MOTHER OF PEARL STAINLESS STEEL BEZEL PINK STRAP

fields.name: Fossil Mini Carlie Pearl & Rose Gold 28mm Ladies' Watch
fields.description: By combining a marvelous mother of pearl face with opulent rose gold-tone steel and a mesh bracelet; this dainty 28mm Fossil Mini Carlie watch exudes a classically feminine aesthetic. The neat round face of this quartz timepiece is adorned by slender watch hands and hour markers - both in the on-trend rose gold-tone. Utilizing the stylish mesh style, the bracelet is also crafted in a slender sizing for a comfortable and lightweight feel on the wrist. An ideal piece of wristwear to pair and wear with both casual and formal attire, it makes the perfect addition to the watch collection of the stylish and sophisticated lady.

fields.name: Fossil Carlie Mini 28mm Rose Gold Steel Case Watch
fields.description: Designed with a certain charm, Carlie is the watch that will pull your look together effortlessly. The round face is further embellished with white and rose gold batons and Arabic numerals on 12, 3, 6, and 9 o'clock positions. This elegant ladies' watch is a classic piece that will be treasured for years.

fields.name: Citizen Eco-Drive Chandler Blue Dial and Brown Leather Strap Men's Watch
fields.description: This gents Citizen watch has a black ion-plated steel case and is powered by a Citizen Eco-Drive movement. It is fitted with a brown leather strap and features a blue dial. The watch also has a date function.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Drive Calibre 8700 Rose Case Brown Leather Strap Perpetual Calendar Alarm Function 100M Wr Watch
fields.description: The Calibre 8700 offers effortless style, with a brown leather strap and rose gold-tone case. Featuring a 1/5 second chronograph which measures up to 60 minutes, perpetual calendar, alarm and anti-reflective sapphire crystal. This timepiece features Citizen Eco-Drive technology - powered by light, any light. Never needs a battery.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Drive Red Arrows Limited Edition 45mm Skyhawk Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Citizen is proud to present its Limited Edition Red Arrows Skyhawk A.T timepiece. Thanks to its Radio-Controlled Atomic Clock Synchronization Technology. this watch keeps incredibly precise time. The RAF Red Arrows Limited Edition insignia is engraved on the case back whilst its official logo appears on the dial. Limited to 9999 Pieces Worldwide and presented in a Limited Edition Presentation Box.

fields.name: Citizen Dress Sport 43mm Blue Dial Calibre 6600 Steel Yellow Gold Bracelet Watch
fields.description: This updated version of PCAT adds a dress-sport styling to the popular collection. Features include atomic timekeeping with synchronized time adjustment in 43 cities worldwide, Eco-Drive technology, perpetual calendar, power reserve indicator and a chronograph. It has a brown leather strap and 43mm rose-gold tone stainless-steel case with a stylish green dial. For anyone looking to blend timelessness with technology, this watch will hit all the buttons.

fields.name: Citizen Eco-Drive Red Arrows men's stainless steel bracelet watch
fields.description: From Citizen's RAF Red Arrows collection, this 43mm men's chronograph watch is styled in stainless steel, with a black leather strap that features red accent stitching. The official Red Arrows insignia is on the watch caseback. This men's watch is water resistant to 100m, with 1/5 second chronograph and 12/24 hour time. Eco-Drive technology means the watch will never need a batter, being powered by light, and it comes with Citizen's five-year warranty.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Drive Rose Case Cream Dial Brown Leather Strap Date Feature Batons Watch
fields.description: A classic addition to any collection, this quality Citizen watch is the perfect blend of elegance and durability. With a stainless steel case and leather strap, this watch is both durable and comfortable to wear. It is also water resistant to 50m and has a solar movement, making it a great choice for any man on the go.

fields.name: Citizen Silhouette Chronograph Stainless Steel & Mother-of-Pearl Ladies' Watch
fields.description: This Citizen Silhouette Chronograph Ladies' Watch boasts a two-tone stainless steel watch strap, Mother-of-Pearl dial and features a 1-second chronograph, 12/24-hour and date. With a 32mm case of mineral glass crystal, it utilizes Citizen's Eco-Drive technology - the watch is powered by any light and is water-resistant, with Citizen's five-year warranty.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Drive Silver Dial Gold Plated Bracelet Watch
fields.description: The Citizen Ladies' Silhouette "mini'" timepiece is the perfect practical daily wrist wear. Gold-tone case and bracelet with a white dial and easy-to-read numerals. Splash resistance and a manicure friendly clasp. Powered by Citizen Eco-Drive technology, this watch never needs a battery.

fields.name: Citizen Eco-Drive Pearl & Steel Mesh 27mm Ladies' Watch
fields.description: Made in a neat 27mm sizing, this dainty Citizen watch is crafted with Eco-Drive meaning that it never requires a battery and is instead powered by any light source. It matches a radiant pearl face with a sleek silver-tone steel casing and mesh bracelet for a captivating ladies' timepiece that exudes a cool and sophisticated aura. Perfect to accentuate both casual and formal attire.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Silhouette Crystal Silver & Rose Gold Tone Ladies' Watch
fields.description: Stylish and accurate, the Citizen Eco Silhouette Crystal Ladies' Watch in rose-gold tone stainless steel with a silver dial is decorated with showstopping Silhouette crystals. Featuring Citizen's Eco-Drive technology, the Eco Silhouette Crystal Watch will never need a battery, powered by any light. With a 36mm case, 50m water resistance and Citizen's five-year warranty, this stunning watch is designed to go the distance.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Drive Silhouette Mother of Pearl Dial 31mm Ladies Bracelet
fields.description: For a wonderful watch that glitters and glistens with high-shine appeal, this captivating ladies' Citizen watch is simply perfect. Exclusive to Fields the Jeweler, it is crafted from both gold and silver-tone steel in a dainty 31mm sizing that elegantly drapes around the wrist. The round face is filled with shimmering mother of pearl and adorned with clear crystals at each of the hour markers. Sleek, sophisticated and brimming with a beautiful shine; this quartz Citizen watch makes a perfect present for friends, for family and for you.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Drive Corso Two Tone Blue Diamond Set Dial Watch
fields.description: The Citizen Ladies' Silhouette Diamond features 12 hand-set diamonds set on a stunning blue dial and a striking octagonal bezel. The stainless steel case and bracelet with gold-tones add sophistication and style. Powered by Citizen Eco-Drive technology means this timepiece is powered by light and never needs a battery.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Barclay Navy Dial Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Tommy Hilfiger is one of the world’s leading designer lifestyle brands and is internationally recognised for celebrating the essence of classic American cool style. So if you're looking for a watch that will show off your sense of style, this one if a great choice. Made from stainless steel, this watch is durable and long-lasting. And because of the eye-catching design, this watch is a great addition to a variety of outfits. So make yourself stand out from the crowd and grab this watch today!

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Parker 44mm Blue Dial Chronograph Yellow Gold PVD Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Tommy Hilfiger presents this elegant and luxurious model from the Parker collection. Fitted with an ion plated stainless steel bracelet in yellow gold, this timepiece features a matching bezel and a blue dial. Technically enhanced through introduction of a chronograph and a tachymeter, this stylish piece offers water resistancy up to 50m and is powered by quartz movement. Order today!

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Mason Sport 44mm Blue Dial Chronograph Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Gents Mason model introduced by Tommy Hilfiger is a sports watch which will render you ready for just about anything. It portrays a sleek stainless steel appearance combined with a masculine deep blue dial as well as white and red details to tonally accompany the signature Tommy Hilfiger flag which is discreetly placed on the clock face. While water resistancy is kept at minimum 30M, the watch provides innovative data functionality by featuring not only a chronograph but also date, day of the week and 24 hour indicators.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Baker Ionic Thin Gold Plated 2 Steel Mens Watch
fields.description: Coming from the popular Baker collection, this Tommy Hilfiger mens watch is a great addition to any modern man's collection. The stainless steel case and bracelet, and mineral crystal dial glass make this watch a durable piece that will be with you for years to come. And the black dial gives it an elegant and stylish look.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Max Chronograph 44mm Quartz Blue Dial Steel Case Blue Silicone Strap Watch
fields.description: A Tommy Hilfiger gentlemen's' watch from the Max collection, this elegant timepiece is presented on a 44mm stainless steel case with a blue sunray and multifunctional dial. It is finished on a blue silicone strap and is water-resistant up to 50 meters.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Trent 46mm Green Dial Chronograph Gun Metal Case Brown Strap Watch
fields.description: Tommy Hilfiger presents the Trent gents leather watch model which embodies bourgeois heritage aesthetic with a fashion-forward edge. The classic brown leather strap works infallibly with the dark green dial and polished stainless steel case. It features a three hand movement, sub dial chronograph and a date window making it a well packaged functional time measuring tool.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Tea Champagne Coloured Dial Yellow Gold PVD Case Mesh Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Tommy Hilfiger's Tea ladies model in the ionic gold plated duplex steel variation presents itself as a timeless piece. It embodies the ageless charm not only through the use of anti-corrosive and anti-allergen duplex stainless steel used on the case and the mesh bracelet, but also with the choice of beautifully polished tones of yellow gold and champagne on the dial. An urban twist is added with the signature Tommy Hilfiger flag on the clock face.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Luna 38mm Silver Dial Cubic Zirconia Set Bezel Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Internationally recognized for celebrating the essence of classic American cool style, Tommy Hilfiger presents the new Autumn 2021 collection offering a range of daily chic timepieces which enable statements of feminine elegance. This model features a silver dial with a cubic zirconia set bezel and is fitted with a stainless steel and bracelet. Powered by quartz movement, this timepiece offers water resistancy of 30M/3BAR.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger 34mm Silver Dial Steel & Yellow Gold Plated Case Watch
fields.description: Internationally recognized for celebrating the essence of classic American cool style, Tommy Hilfiger presents the new Autumn 2021 collection offering a range of daily chic timepieces which enable statements of feminine elegance. This model features a silver dial with a yellow gold plated stainless steel case and bracelet. Powered by quartz movement, this timepiece offers water resistancy of 30M/3BAR.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Kennedy 38mm Silver Dial Chrono Z Bezel Steel & Rose Gold Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Internationally recognized for celebrating the essence of classic American cool style, Tommy Hilfiger presents the new Autumn 2021 collection offering a range of daily chic timepieces which enable statements of feminine elegance. This model features a silver dial with a dual tone steel and rose gold case and bracelet. Powered by quartz movement, this timepiece offers water resistancy of 50M/5BAR.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Emma 38mm Quartz Pink Dial Rose Gold IP Case Pink Rubber Strap Watch
fields.description: A Tommy Hilfiger ladies' watch from the Emma collection, this elegant timepiece is presented on a 38mm carnation gold case, featuring a white bezel and white dial with rose gold accents. The watch is finished on a pink silicone strap and is water-resistant up to 30 meters.

fields.name: Tommy Hilfiger Layla 38mm Quartz Gold Dial Gold IP Case Mesh Bracelet Watch
fields.description: A Tommy Hilfiger ladies' watch from the Layla collection, this elegant timepiece is presented on a 38mm gold IP case, with a minimalist multifunction gold dial and batons. The watch is finished on a gold mesh bracelet and is water-resistant up to 30 meters.

fields.name: Garmin Venu 2 40mm Black Case Black Leather Strap WatchGarmin Venu 2 40mm Black Case Black Leather Strap Watch
fields.description: Get in tune with your mind and body with Venu® 2. This GPS smartwatch has advanced health monitoring and fitness features to help you better understand what's going on inside your body. It feels good to move. Switch up your activities with animated workouts and more than 25 built-in indoor and GPS sports apps. Feed your soul with your favorite music, stored right on your wrist for phone-free listening when paired with wireless headphones (not included). And battery life up to 11 days with rapid recharging lets you get an uninterrupted picture of your health. This is what it's all about. Mind and body - connected by Garmin.

fields.name: Garmin Epix Gen 2 47mm Titanium Case Brown Leather Strap Watch
fields.description: Wear epix™, be epic. With epix, the premium active smartwatch, you can take on every day with a stunning AMOLED display and up to 16 days of battery life in smartwatch mode. Stay connected with smart features, Garmin Pay™ contactless payments, and music storage. Understand your body with 24/7 health and wellness monitoring features that track Pulse Ox, heart rate, respiration, and more. Train how you want with 30+ built-in sports apps, and take it further with performance metrics and Garmin Coach training plans. When you’re ready for adventure, you can download TopoActive mapping via Wi-Fi® connectivity, or get it preloaded on Sapphire editions. Plus, Sapphire editions support multi-band GNSS technology for stronger, better, more accurate positioning in challenging environments.

fields.name: Garmin D2 MACH 1 Multifunction Titanium Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Accelerate the adventure with the D2™ Mach 1 GPS aviator smartwatch. With classic style and a modern AMOLED touchscreen display, this premium timepiece puts the most advanced tools for flying right at your fingertips. Check weather reports and radar, get automatic alerts for changing conditions, and navigate with the moving map, worldwide aeronautical database, and HSI — plus more. Pair with the Garmin Pilot™ app to transfer flight plans to the watch and log your flights automatically. Use the smartwatch’s health and wellness features to help ensure you’re ready for your next flight — and find new ways to move with its more than 30 built-in sports apps and animated workouts. And be ready for departure with up to 11 days of battery life. Presented on a titanium case and bracelet, this smartwatch is ready for the adventures that lay ahead!

fields.name: Garmin Venu 2S Rose Gold White Case White Leather Strap Watch
fields.description: Get in tune with your mind and body with Venu® 2S. This smaller-sized GPS smartwatch has advanced health monitoring and fitness features to help you better understand what's going on inside your body. It feels good to move. Switch up your activities with animated workouts and more than 25 built-in indoor and GPS sports apps. Feed your soul with your favorite music, stored right on your wrist for phone-free listening when paired with wireless headphones (not included). And battery life up to 10 days with rapid recharging lets you get an uninterrupted picture of your health. This is what it's all about. Mind and body - connected by Garmin. Order today!

fields.name: Garmin fenix 5 Plus Solar Flare Orange 47mm Smartwatch
fields.description: This Garmin fenix 5 Plus smartwatch stands out for all the right reasons with its striking orange silicone strap - known as solar flare orange by the brand. Made in a regal 47mm sizing, it occupies a commanding presence on the wrist. Filled with features, it empowers the wearer with the ability to make contactless payments, the ability to store up to one-thousand songs, premium GPS tracking and more. Note the sensors on the steel caseback which monitor and track the likes of your heart rate. With this Garmin smartwatch, the wearer is treated to the likes of: Wellness monitoring tools such as sleep monitoring. PS and color TOPO maps featuring Trendline. Bluetooth smartphone connectivity. Up to twelve days of battery life. Customizable screen.

fields.name: Garmin fenix 5 Plus Black Silicone 42mm Smartwatch
fields.description: Made in a smaller, yet still highly visible and accessible, 42mm sizing; this Garmin fenix 5 Plus offers the wearer a neater version of some of the more robust smartwatches. Made from a strong steel bezel and casing and supple silicone strap, it offers the wearer both a secure and comfortable fit on the wrist. With premium GPS performance (GLONASS compatibility and Galileo satellite reception), advanced performance metrics and the ability to store up to one-thousand songs; it is poised and primed to perform. With this Garmin smartwatch, the wearer is treated to the likes of: Wellness monitoring tools such as sleep monitoring GPS and color TOPO maps featuring Trendline Bluetooth smartphone connectivity. Up to seven days of battery life.Customisable screen.

fields.name: Tissot Seastar 1000 Blue Chronograph Black Rubber Strap 46mm Mens Watch
fields.description: Powered by quartz movement, this is a classic men's watch from the Tissot. With a blue face, three sub dials, and a date window, housed in a stainless steel case with black bezel, the watch is finished off by the black rubber strap. This exquisite piece is also water resistant up to 300m.

fields.name: Tissot Seastar Powermatic 80 43mm Blue Dial Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Thanks to its aquatic ability to handle pressure up to 30M/30BAR (1000ft), Tissot Seastar 1000 Powermatic 80 is the perfect collection for safe exploration of the seabed. Its useful and robust features will ensure you the perfect assistance to discover unknown depths while the innovative Powermatic 80 movement boasts 80 hours of power reserve, which is enough to continue telling time accurately even if the watch is not worn for three days. Featuring a blue dial, this timepiece is fitted with a stainless steel bracelet and offers warranty of 2 years.

fields.name: Tissot Classic Dream Watch
fields.description: Gents Tissot Classic Watch. Look no further for the perfect classic watch - this piece from Tissot has a white round dial, silver indicators and batons, a date window and is finished with a brown leather strap. Sophisticated and masculine, this watch is sure to never date.

fields.name: Tissot PRS516 45mm Chronograph Silver Dial Black Bezel Steel Case Brown Strap Watch
fields.description: The most prestigious sports watch in Tissot's collection. Inspired by racing cars and the watch legend Tissot PR 516 designed in 1965, it is equipped with an automatic movement and floating indices, adding a powerful 3D effect to the dial. This model features a silver dial in a black PVD coated stainless steel case and is fitted with a brown leather strap.

fields.name: Tissot T-Classic PR 100 Chronograph Two-Toned Grey and Rose Gold Men's Watch
fields.description: A classic to be worn at all occasions, the Tissot PR 100 is fitted with Swiss quartz movement, water-resistant and scratch-resistant properties. The beautiful black ion-plated steel case comprises a dark grey dial and three chronograph sub dials with a date function. Styled with the rose gold details of the case and arms, the dark grey stainless-steel bracelet sets the luxury tone. A stunning piece for stunning men.

fields.name: Tissot Gentleman Quartz Auto 40mm Blue Dial Titanium Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Tissot presents the Gentleman Quartz model. The timepiece features a blue dial housed within a titanium case and is fitted with titanium bracelet. Offering water resistancy of 100m, it is a classic watch destined to be worn often and for every occasion.

fields.name: Tissot Dream Collection 28mm White Dial Ladies Watch
fields.description: Elegant and eye-catching, this Tissot ladies watch features an exquisite white dial with yellow gold plated roman numeral hour markers, housed in a stainless steel case, and finished with a two tone stainless steel bracelet. This versatile watch will compliment any outfit, and is water resistant up to 100m.

fields.name: Tissot Seastar 1000 36mm Quartz Blue Dial Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: At 36mm, the Seastar 1000 Quartz has a natural confidence about it. It’s chic, assertive, and versatile, ready to stride through the urban jungle unfazed and also strong enough to dive deep under the sea. Presented on a blue dial, it comes with a stainless steel case and bracelet, a uni-directional rotating bezel with a mineral glass insert, a screw-down crown, and water resistance up to 30 bar (300m / 1000ft). Change your outlook and step into another world.

fields.name: Tissot Lovely Silver Dial Stainless Steel Bracelet Ladies' Watch
fields.description: This Tissot watch shimmers and shines at all times due to the metallic silver-tones used in its design. The round face glimmers in this silver-tone and it features two matching hands and index hour markers. It is crafted with a neat interface that makes it easy to tell the time - even at a quick glance. The stainless steel bezel, bracelet, casing and crown of the watch are all rendered in this shimmering silver-tone also. Shining and sophisticated, this is a luxuriously lovely ladies' watch by Tissot.

fields.name: Tissot Seastar 1000 35.5mm Quartz White Dial Steel Case Steel Bracelet Watch
fields.description: At 36mm, the Seastar 1000 Quartz has a natural confidence about it. It’s chic, assertive, and versatile, ready to stride through the urban jungle unfazed and also strong enough to dive deep under the sea. Presented on a white dial, it comes with a stainless steel case and bracelet, a uni-directional rotating bezel with a mineral glass insert, a screw-down crown, and water resistance up to 30 bar (300m / 1000ft). And if you want, you can quickly switch the bracelet for a white silicone strap. Change your outlook and step into another world.

fields.name: Tissot Dream Collection 28mm Yellow Dial Ladies Watch
fields.description: Elegant and eye-catching, this Tissot ladies watch features an exquisite white dial with roman numeral hour markers, housed in a stainless steel case, and finished with a classic stainless steel bracelet. This versatile watch will compliment any outfit, and is water resistant up to 100m.

fields.name: Tissot PR 100 Sport Chic 38mm Quartz White Mother of Pearl Dial Steel & Rose Gold Bracelet Watch
fields.description: While the PR 100 collection celebrates strength, it does not neglect its feminine aesthetic. Every woman can find something to love in this Sport&Chic watch that is also practical, thanks to indexes and hands set with luminescent materials providing perfect visibility. The 38mm case is crafted from stainless steel with a rose gold PVD coating that stretches onto its bracelet. This chronograph watch has a striking pink dial with three sub-dials, a date window on the right side, and is protected by a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal. The watch is water-resistant up to 100 meters.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Classic Chronograph Steel 43mm Men's Watch
fields.description: Armani stainless steel chronograph bracelet watch for him, Round case with black dial, chronograph function and date at 4 o'clock position.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Luigi 46mm Black Dial Chronograph Steel Case Black Leather Strap Watch
fields.description: Sporty yet sophisticated, this Emporio Armani timepiece from Luigi collection features a sleek polished stainless steel style complemented by a matte black chronograph dial and perforated black leather strap. Order today! Please note, it's possible that this item is ex-display and may show signs of wear and tear.

fields.name: Emporio Armani 43mm Black Chronograph Dial Black PVD Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: This Emporio Armani timepiece from Mario collection features a black dial with gunmetal stick indexes and a 43mm black PVD plated stainless steel case. Fitted with a black PVD plated stainless steel bracelet it is powered by quartz movement and offers water resistancy of 30m.

fields.name: Emporio Armani men's chronograph blue leather strap watch
fields.description: A handsome timepiece from the Emporio Armani collection. Italian style and design perfectly combined in a timepiece that will bring quality and style to your look. Featuring a round dial, date function, chronograph and luxury blue leather strap.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Diver 42mm Green Dial Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: This Emporio Armani Diver model embodies functionality with robust style. Featuring a green dial and bezel with a stainless steel case, it is fitted with a stainless steel bracelet. Offering water resistancy of 100m, it is powered by quartz movement.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Mario 43mm Automatic Black Skeleton Dial Black Ceramic Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Emporio Armani presents this gents model from the Mario collection. Featuring a black skeleton dial and an automatic movement, the timepiece is fitted with a black bracelet and offers water resistancy of 50 meters.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Ladies' Stone Set Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Emporio Armani T-Bar Ladies' Stone Set Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch. The Emporio Armani T-Bar collection of watches boast the sophisticated design for which the brand is renowned. This stunning T-Bar ladies' model has a shimmering mother of pearl dial enhanced with cubic zirconia and decorated with Roman numerals and baton markers. The dial is showcased by the collection's signature T-bar detailing and a stainless steel case and bracelet.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Kappa Rose Crystal Dial Rose Gold Plated Mesh Bracelet Watch
fields.description: This shimmering ladies' dress watch from Emporio Armani features a rose gold IP case, rose gold sunray dial with crystal dot hour markers and a polished rose gold IP mesh bracelet.

fields.name: Emporio Armani rose gold-plated two colour bracelet watch
fields.description: This Emporio Armani ladies' watch combines stainless steel with rose gold-plating to create a beautifully versatile timepiece. The champagne-colored dial is set with sparkling stone-set hour markers for that subtle touch of glamour. Bring a touch of Italian style to your look with this fabulous watch from one of the world's most famous fashion brands.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Ladies' Stone-set Stainless Steel Watch
fields.description: Emporio Armani T-Bar Ladies' Stone-set Stainless Steel Watch. The Emporio Armani T-Bar watch collection for women showcases the sophisticated watchmaking for which the Italian brand is renowned. Elegant, high-quality timepieces with the collection's iconic T-bar detailing. This exquisite ladies' watch features a white dial that dazzles with a dusting of crystals. The dial is further enhanced by sleek silver-tone indexes and the Emporio Armani logo at 12 o'clock. The 32mm stainless steel case sits gracefully on a slender stainless steel bracelet. A must-have for the woman who desires glamorous timekeeping, this watch from Emporio Armani will give a sparkling edge to any ensemble.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Gianni T Bar 32mm White Dial Rose Gold Steel Case Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Emporio Armani presents this elegant T-Bar Gianni ladies model featuring a white dial with crystals-adorned centre. Fitted with a two tone rose gold and stainless steel bracelet, the timepiece is powered by quartz movement and offers water resistancy of 30 meters.

fields.name: Emporio Armani Ladies Silver Dial Cream Leather Strap Watch
fields.description: A glamorous ladies' watch by Emporio Armani. Expertly crafted from smooth stainless steel, this sleek timepiece boasts a round silver and rose-toned dial adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia stones. Completed with a striking rose gold-plated case and supple cream leather strap, a stylish watch that will see you from day to night.

fields.name: Fossil FB- 01 42mm Chronograph Blue Dial Brown Leather Strap Watch
fields.description: Mastering the balance of vintage inspiration with modern design, this timepiece encapsulates the minimalistic aesthetic, which sits effortlessly against the wrist. Presented on a 42mm blue dial and bezel that features three sub-dials and a date window, this elegant simplicity is further accentuated with a brown leather strap. It is water resistant up to 100 meters.

fields.name: Fossil Jacqueline 36mm Sun Moon White Dial Two Tone Bracelet Watch
fields.description: Fossil presents the 36mm ladies Jacqueline model featuring a white sun-moon dial and fitted with a two tone yellow gold PVD and stainless steel bracelet. Offering water resistancy of 30 meters, the timepiece is powered by quartz movement.

fields.name: Citizen Endeavour Gents Eco-Drive Bracelet Watch
fields.description: The Citizen Endeavour will make a statement, featuring a striking green dial with orange accents and stainless steel bracelet. Features include a one-way rotating bezel, anti-reflective crystal, screw-back case and Citizen Eco-drive technology. This timepiece is powered by light and never needs a battery.

fields.name: Citizen Eco Drive Silhouette Mother of Pearl Dial Silhouette Set Dial & Bezel Date
fields.description: The Citizen Silhouette Crystal offers a timeless look that will never go out of style. A mother-of-pearl dial and two-tone case are adorned with Silhouette crystals and a cabochon crown. The watch features a three-hand dial and keeps track of the current date. Featuring a sapphire crystal and water resistance to 50 meters. Citizen Eco-Drive technology means this watch is powered by light and never needs a battery.
